typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		YEAR as string,
		FL_DATE as string,
		OP_UNIQUE_CARRIER as string,
		OP_CARRIER_AIRLINE_ID as string,
		OP_CARRIER_FL_NUM as string,
		ORIGIN_AIRPORT_ID as string,
		ORIGIN as string,
		ORIGIN_CITY_NAME as string,
		ORIGIN_STATE_ABR as string,
		DEST_AIRPORT_ID as string,
		DEST as string,
		DEST_CITY_NAME as string,
		DEST_STATE_ABR as string,
		DEP_DELAY as string,
		DEP_DELAY_NEW as string,
		ARR_TIME as string,
		ARR_DELAY_NEW as string,
		CARRIER_DELAY as string,
		WEATHER_DELAY as string,
		NAS_DELAY as string,
		SECURITY_DELAY as string,
		LATE_AIRCRAFT_DELAY as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
filterwetherdelay aggregate(groupBy(ORIGIN_CITY_NAME),
	avgWeatherDelay = avg(toFloat(WEATHER_DELAY))) ~> AverageWeatherDelay
source1 filter(toFloat(WEATHER_DELAY) > 0) ~> filterwetherdelay
AverageWeatherDelay sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Column_20 as string,
		Column_21 as string,
		Column_22 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
